short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Task Management Application that helps you get things done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to help you stop wasting time on the internet! It provides a To Do List on the right hand side where you can list out what tasks you're trying to get done.

It provides a widget that you can move around which shows you the task you need to be focusing on and how much time you've spend doing it.
